abilities.name: Gilded Imprints
abilities.details: Everett's basic attacks, Sunfire Volley and Brilliant Dawn embed Golden Needles on the target that stacks infinitely. Killing the enemy target will return all the Golden Needles back to him, earning him bonus gold depending on the number of returned needles.

abilities.name: Radiant Volley
abilities.details:
Everett throws three needles in a target direction, each dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the first enemy hit.

When shielded, Everett will throw five needles instead.

abilities.name: Golden Sentry
abilities.details: Everett places a Golden Sentry at a target location, granting vision in a small area for a short duration. When Everett basic attacks an enemy, if that enemy is within the Golden Sentry's range, the sentry will also fire at the same target, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) per hit and applying a stack of Golden Needle.

abilities.name: Auric Thread
abilities.details:
Everett pulls back all the Golden Needles, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) based on the number of needles pulled back.

When shielded, the damage is increased based on Everett's critical strike chance.

If an enemy is killed by this ability, Gilded Imprints's bonus gold gain will still be triggered.

abilities.name: Brilliant Dawn
abilities.details:
Everett channels the full power of his golden essence, gaining bonus attack range and empowering his basic attacks to pierce through all enemies in a line.

If Everett is shielded while in this state, he will gain bonus attack speed. If the shield expires or is broken, the bonus stats will be lost.

While Brilliant Dawn is active, Golden Sentry also gains extended attack range, and its attacks will pierce through all enemies in a line, mirroring Everett's empowered basic attacks.
